text.author: Antonio Guterres
text.summary: In his annual report on the work of the organization at the 74th United Nations General Assembly, the UN Secretary-General summarizes the advancements of the past year, voices concerns related to economic and political strife, and urges the use of diplomacy in resolving disputes.
text.title: Report of the Secretary-General
